title: Can give zakat in small amounts to many people throughout the month or must pay it all at once Assim
transcript: the next question is from uh sister sally assalam alaikum sheikh i own my zakat in ramadan will it be okay to distribute small amounts to many poor people throughout the whole month or am i to pay it all at once this depends if your date due for zakat is on the 1st of ramadan you have to pay it all at once if your due date is on the 30th of ramadan from fro so from the beginning of the month you can distribute it as you wish without any problem in sha [Music] allah
